@graph.caption: metal spoon scooping some baked tater tot casserole out of a white casserole dish.

@graph.name: Vegan Tater Tot Casserole - Nora Cooks
@graph.description: This Vegan Tater Tot Casserole has layers of vegan ground meat, veggies, cheese, and tots. Serve it for dinner or an easy holiday side dish!

@graph.name: Vegan Tater Tot Casserole
@graph.description: Vegan Tater Tot Casserole will quickly become a family favorite! Topped with vegan cheese and crispy golden brown tots, it’s an incredibly delicious one-pan holiday side dish or easy weeknight dinner.
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces cremini mushrooms, sliced or chopped
2 tablespoons all purpose flour (or gluten free flour)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and lightly grease a 9x13 inch casserole dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and lightly grease a 9x13 inch casserole dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Impossible meat in a pan until cooked through over medium-high heat, breaking it up with a spatula or wooden spoon as it browns.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Impossible meat in a pan until cooked through over medium-high heat, breaking it up with a spatula or wooden spoon as it browns.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the sliced mushrooms and sauté, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes until they soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the sliced mushrooms and sauté, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes until they soften.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cumin, oregano, plus salt and pepper to taste and stir.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cumin, oregano, plus salt and pepper to taste and stir.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle in the flour and stir, then slowly stir in the coconut milk and add the Worcestershire sauce, corn and green beans. Stir well and simmer the mixture for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle in the flour and stir, then slowly stir in the coconut milk and add the Worcestershire sauce, corn and green beans. Stir well and simmer the mixture for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer mixture to the prepared dish, then layer on vegan cheese. Arrange the tater tots on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer mixture to the prepared dish, then layer on vegan cheese. Arrange the tater tots on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30-40 minutes, uncovered, until the tots are golden. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30-40 minutes, uncovered, until the tots are golden. Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipeInstructions.text: Leftover tater tot casserole will keep in a covered container, refrigerated for up to 4 days. Reheat in the microwave until warm. It can also be frozen before baking. No need to thaw first, simply place it in the oven and cook until warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Leftover tater tot casserole will keep in a covered container, refrigerated for up to 4 days. Reheat in the microwave until warm. It can also be frozen before baking. No need to thaw first, simply place it in the oven and cook until warm.
